name: Coloring book Fidget Spinner
description:
Here you go with your own customized fidget spinner. What are you waiting for? download the latest coloring fidget spinner app, paint it and battle with your friends and family. You can easily customize your fidget spinner and spin it. Real feel of fidget spinner in this colorful game.

You can choose your fidget spinner from three different categories (Flower, Mandala and Patterns) to customize it according to your colors. Train yourself with the simple spin option and then battle with your friends and family and don't forget to battle with AI. Beat the AI and you'll be the best in fidget spinning battle.

Features:
- Real Spin Feel.
- Multiple Coloring Options.
- Mandala, Flowers and Patterns added.
- Share your creativity with your friends and family.
- Save your creative work.
- Battle with friends and family.
- Battle with strong AI.
- Free to play

Please give your reviews !!!
